events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster as it fits the Software Engineer role requirements.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage your application and will contact you soon.
The initial screening for your software engineer application was completed successfully, and you have passed to the next stage.
Thank you for responding promptly to our screening questions; your detailed answers impressed the hiring team.
We have scheduled your technical interview for the Software Engineer position on May 20th at 10 AM via video conference.
